name: prob
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used in informal speech and writing as a short form of "problem" : I'll do it first thing in the morning, no prob! Use the code below, this should not be a prob.
used in informal writing as a short form of "probably": Not sure how much, prob $30.
More examplesFewer examplesI thanked her and she said "No prob."Not a prob, I'll send it again.Don't want to worry you but my granny had an ear prob that turned out to be a brain prob.I know you're prob a bit disappointed.Prob a silly question but what's the difference between yoga and pilates?
